register.reg_condition: when AArch32 is supported at any Exception level

purpose_text.para: Defines the access permission for each of the sixteen memory domains.

configuration_text.para: This register has no function when TTBCR.EAE is set to 1, to select the Long-descriptor translation table format.

field_description.para: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15. Permitted values are:

field_value_description.para: No access. Any access to the domain generates a Domain fault.
Client. Accesses are checked against the permission bits in the translation tables.
Manager. Accesses are not checked against the permission bits in the translation tables.

ps.name: MRC
MCR
